inclusion.criterion: heart disease primary cause of dyspnea
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: abdominal discomfort due to hepatosplanchnic congestion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: chest x-ray with findings indicative of heart failure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: hospitalization and intravenous therapy for at least 24 hours
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: systolic blood pressure consistently less than 90 mm Hg
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: PCWP < 20 mm Hg within 24 hours before randomization
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: clinical status so acutely unstable that the potential subject could not tolerate placement of a right heart catheter or the 3-hour placebo period
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unable to have intravenous nitroglycerin withheld
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
